name: Terminal_ - DEMO
description:
BEFORE PLAYING THE GAME, READ THE README FILE!

Terminal_ is a text-based puzzle to find passwords and explore an old computer.  The idea originally came around when I tried to make a game within 1 week, since then I expanded it into a full demo and it's here now!

If you choose to try the game, please consider leaving a comment on what you think of it.  Also, this game is played using two components, one is the program itself that is a text-based command line type program that represents the old computer.  The other is a website that contains information that the computer wouldn't really have a way to tell you.

I may update this demo occasionally and someday I might produce a full game that features a lot more information and a better story than what I came up with for this short demo.
